name: Last Wood Demo
detailed_description:
Last Wood is an oceanic survival colony simulation game. It is a world after The Fall, most of the continents have disappeared, only pieces of islands remained.

You will guide several survivors in the ocean to build rafts, survive, defend the threats, explore the unknown world, to even have offsprings and discover the truth of what happened to the world.

Oceanic Survival


Sea farming, fishing, collection rain water... Experience a unique survival simulation on the sea.

Survivors


Meet survivors with diverse backstories, characteristics, and specialties. Guide them to build and craft handworks to meet their needs of water, food, shelter. Help them develop skills, technology, and even relationships with each other.

Threat


Animals, raiders, deep ones, Kraken... Defeat your enemies with traps, equipment, and strategy.

Sail and Exploration


Use paddle, sail, and rudder to travel. Scavenge generated island for resources and technics. Exploring ruins of the old world or mysterious shrine of other species. Find out the truth of The Fall.

Nature


Overcome disasters such as storm or hailstone by loading your storage with supplies.

Random Event


Floating survivor might join your colony. Voladors might jump on your ship and become your meal. And fisher might catch treasure chest when fishing.

Last Wood was first a prototype on itch. We received amazing support from the community (~250k views so far). So we decided to put an Early Access version with tons of new contents.

short_description: In Last Wood, it is an oceanic world after The Fall. You will guide several survivors in the ocean from pieces of rafts, survive, build rafts, defense the threats, explore the unknown world, even have their offsprings, and find the truth of the world.
supported_languages: English, French, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OSX 10.9
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 (AMD or NVIDIA equivalent)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
